ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RoK info (mild spoilers!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm... I remember reading in an EQ news post somewhere...( maximimeq I think) that certian magics wouldnt perform right in kunark... could this be why the
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm...
I remember reading in an EQ news post somewhere...( maximimeq I think)
that certian magics wouldnt perform right in kunark...
could this be why the song appears bugged?

I find it hard to believe that they would overlook the speed boost
seeing as that is what we all love the most.....well me anyways.



> Okay, I won't spoil it too much for you guys but Kunark is AWESOME:
> Rejoice you are a bard because it is mammoth in scale and its mostly
> outdoors. I simply cannot tell you how happy I am, btw, that we have
charm
> back again. =)
>
> New Songs:
> Selos51 is broken of course, you get invis/see invis/lev but no speed.
> Everything sees invis anyhow but trust me, you'll want lev.
